Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2700006c>憎いでしょう？ 許せないでしょう？ わたしの気持ち、 わかってくれましたか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2700006C>Do you hate them? Do you not forgive them? Do you see now, why I feel the way I do?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2700006e><Eugene>……あの人がわたしの お父さんの命を奪いました。 だから、あの人と同じガジュマは 許せないんです……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2700006E><Eugene>... That man robbed my father of his life. I will never forgive him or any other Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2700006f>……でも、他のガジュマは 何もしてないんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2700006F>...But the other Gajuma didn't do anything wrong, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000070>でも、今、<Tytree>さんは ガジュマへの憎しみで いっぱいじゃないですか？ どうしてですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000070><Tytree>, just now, were you not consumed with an overwhelming hatred for Gajuma? Why do you think that is?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000072>私を殺したのはガジュマなのよ。 私の仇をとってくれないの？ ガジュマが……憎くないの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000072>I was murdered by a Gajuma. Aren't you going to avenge me? Don't you...hate Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000073>だけど、姉貴…… もし、犯人がヒューマだったら おれはどうすればいいんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000073>I know, sis... But say the killer was a Huma, then what would I do?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000074>その犯人だけを憎みなさい。 犯人は<Purple>異常<White>な存在なの。 私たちとは<Cyan>違う<White>存在なの。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000074>You would hate that criminal alone. Criminals are wayward beings. They are <Cyan>different<White> from you and I.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000075>同じヒューマなのに<Cyan>違う<White>。 違う事をしているのに ガジュマはみんな<Cyan>同じ<White>……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000075>We're <Cyan>different<White> despite the fact we're all Huma. Yet Gajuma are all the <Cyan>same<White> despite the fact that they may do different things...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000076>ヒューマとガジュマ…… 何が違うっていうんだ…… どうして違うんだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000076>Huma, Gajuma... What's the difference? Why does there need to be a difference?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000077>……種族なんてなけりゃ…… みんなが同じ種族なら……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000077>If "race" didn't exist, we would all be equal...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000079>この光をつかみなさい。そうすれば、 ガジュマをヒューマに変えられる。 この世界はガジュマのいない ヒューマだけの世界になるの。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000079>Take this light. With it, you can change Gajuma into Huma. The world will then be devoid of Gajuma and become a place where everyone is Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2700007a>種族がなくなれば、 争いも差別もなくなるわ。 平和で平等な世界のために…… つかみなさい、光を!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2700007A>If race were to vanish, then conflict and discrimination would soon follow. For the sake of world peace and equality...grab hold of the light!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2700007e>何をするの!? 違いがあるから争いが起こるのよ!! 皆が同じなら、争いも差別もない 平等な世界になるんでしょう？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2700007E>What are you doing?! Conflict occurs because differences exist! If everyone were the same, then the world would become one without war or prejudice!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2700007f>そうじゃない…… そうじゃないんだ！
<voice:27000080>確かに、ヒューマとガジュマの 間には違いがある。 でも、違いがあるのは ヒューマとガジュマだけじゃないだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000080>Sure, Huma and Gajuma have their differences. But aren't Huma and Gajuma all different to one another regardless of race?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000081>おれはこの世界の誰でもなくて おれでしかないように、 みんながみんなそれぞれでしかない。 顔も身体も考え方もみんな違う。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000081>Sure, Huma and Gajuma have their differences. But aren't Huma and Gajuma all different to one another regardless of race?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000082>ひとつの種族が滅んでも 争いはなくならない。 種族なんて考えそのものを なくさなきゃいけないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000082>Even if one race were to die, people would just find something else to fight about. The idea of race itself is the one thing we can't lose!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000083>だから……姿とか形とか そんなのを同じにしたって 意味がないんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000083>That's why I don't see a point in us all having the same appearance!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000084>だったら、あなたの言う <Cyan>同じ<White>ってどういう意味なの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000084>If that's the case, what do you mean when you say that we're all the "<Cyan>same<White>?"

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000087>……嬉しいとか、悲しいとか、 苦しいとか、優しいとか…… そういう<Yellow>気持ち<White>ってヤツは、 みんな同じだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000087>Happiness and sadness, hardship and kindness... These emotions are the same for everyone, aren't they?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:27000088>おれが言う<Cyan>同じ<White>ってのは、 そういう事なんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:27000088>THAT'S what I mean when I say we're all the <Cyan>same<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a00002f>目を開くのです。 あなたの周りに世界が広がっています。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A00002F>Open your eyes. The world unfolds all around you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000030>私たちはあなたであり、 あなたではありません。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000030>We are you, and yet we are not you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000031>あなたは私たちであり、 私たちではない…… そして、あなたはあなた。 何者でもないのです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000031>You are us, and yet you are not us... Thus, you are you. And nothing more.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000032>考えるのではありません。 <Yellow>感じる<White>のです。 あなたの目は私たちの目。 あなたの耳は私たちの耳。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000032>This is not about thought. It is about <Yellow>Feeling<White>. Your eyes are our eyes. Your ears are our ears.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000033>私たちはあなたと共に世界を見、 あなたと共に世界を感じる。 でも、あなたの心はあなたのもの。 思うままに歩きなさい……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000033>We shall view the world alongside you, and feel the world alongside you. However, your heart is yours alone. Go, walk as much as you wish...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000035>そうです、あるがままを感じ、 すべてを受け入れれば、 あなたの前に、おのずと道は開けます。 さあ、お行きなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000035>Yes. If you feel the world as it is, and take in everything around you, a path will open before you naturally. Now, go forth.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000040>長い時を経て……<Yellow>ヒト<White>はまた、 同じ過ちを繰り返そうとしている。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000040>A long time has passed... <Yellow>People<White> are about to repeat the same mistakes.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000041>あの時、我らはヒューマを 救うべきではなかったのかもしれぬ。 やはり、王の考えは正しかったのでは……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000041>Perhaps saving the Huma back then was a mistake after all. I wonder if the King's views may have been correct...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000042>ふたつの種族の存在こそが 争いの原因であるならば、 ひとつが滅ばぬ限り、 永遠に争いが絶える事はあるまい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000042>If the very existence of the two races is the root of all conflict...then it is likely to continue for an eternity unless one is eliminated.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000043>ヒューマを滅ぼそうという おつもりなのですか？ 私たちにそのような権限があると お考えなのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000043>Then you intend to destroy the Huma? You believe we possess the authority to carry out such an action?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000044>私たちの使命は、 この世界を守る事にある。 ヒューマがその妨げとなるのであれば、 排除も止むを得ないのでは？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000044>Our mission is to protect this world. If the Huma are to become an obstacle in that, is their removal not our only option?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000045>でも、今の状況を見る限り どっちもどっちじゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000045>But as far as we can tell from the current situation, aren't both sides at fault here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000046>だいたい、世界を守るってどういう事？ <Yellow>ヒト<White>のせいで大地が荒れるのを防ぐ事？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000046>What does it really mean to protect this world anyway? To prevent the world from falling into ruin at the fault of the <Yellow>People<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000047>世界の一部であるヒューマを滅ぼす事が 世界を守る事だとは思えないんだけど？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000047>I just don't think protecting this world means destroying the Huma, who are a part of it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000048>確かにおぬしの言い分にも一理ある。 だが、古の戦いを繰り返す事は 避けねばならん……古の戦い…… その損害も甚大であった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000048>Your words do have some truth to them. However, we must avoid a repeat of the ancient war at all costs. The battles of old... They were terrible beyond measure...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a000049>古の戦いより今日まで、 共存の道を歩き続けて来た <Yellow>ヒト<White>の努力も、 認めるべきではありませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A000049><Yellow>People<White> have come away from those dark times, co-existing hand-in-hand until the present day. Do their efforts not deserve our recognition?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a00004a><Yellow>ヒト<White>の視点に立ち、考えれば、 解決策が見つかるかもしれません。 滅ぼすのは最後の手段であるべきだと、 私は考えます。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A00004A>We may find a solution if we simply look at this from a <Yellow>Person's<White> perspective. I believe it best to only consider destruction should all other methods fail.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a00004b>ならば、おぬしはいかにして <Yellow>ヒト<White>と同じ場所に立つつもりか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A00004B>Well then, how do you intend to stand in the place of a <Yellow>Person<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a00004c><Yellow>ヒト<White>の心と目を持つ者を生み出し、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>の世界に送り込むのです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A00004C>I will bring forth a being which shares the same heart and eyes as all common <Yellow>People<White>, and send it forth into this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a00004d>……なるほど、それは妙案だ。 反対の者は？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A00004D>...I see. An ingenious idea. Are there any objections?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a00004e>異論はないようですね？ それでは、私の身体を介して…… <Yellow>心と目<White>を……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A00004E>It seems we are all in agreement. Then, using my own body... The heart and eyes shall be formed.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2a00004f>うむ……我らの力を集め、 新たなる命を生み出そうぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2A00004F>Yes... Let us gather our powers together, and give birth to a new life...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4300001c>キミたちが、 がんばったからね。
<voice:4300001d>ユリスは消滅しました。 邪悪な心に、<Yellow>ヒト<White>の想いが 打ち勝ったのです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4300001D>Yuris is finally gone from this world. His wicked consciousness has been defeated by the love found within all <Yellow>Mortals<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000020>我は汝らの姿に…… ヒューマのみならず、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>の強さ、可能性を見た。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000020>Today you all have done what I once thought impossible. You have proven your worth. I now recognize the strength and potential found within not just Huma, but all <Yellow>Mortals<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000021>おまえたちだけではない。 世界中の<Yellow>ヒトの心<White>が、 我らに<Yellow>希望<White>を見せてくれた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000021>Yes, you were not the only ones fighting today. <Yellow>People<White> all throughout the land have shown us just how strong a heart full of <Yellow>Hope<White> can be.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000023>個々の命は、もろく小さいが、 ひとたび力を合わせれば、 大地をも揺るがす風となる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000023>Though their lives as individuals are fragile and short, when they combine their strengths together, they become a storm capable of shaking the earth itself.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000024>うむ…… 破滅のもの、ユリスを生み出したのも<Yellow>ヒト<White>。 だが、ユリスを打ち破ったのも<Yellow>ヒト<White>……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000024>Indeed. It was <Yellow>Mortals<White> from whom Yuris was birthed... Yet it was <Yellow>Mortals<White>, too, who brought his demise.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000025>ユリスとの戦いで、 世界の秩序は崩壊した。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000025>Yuris' presence has destroyed the previously established order of this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000026><Yellow>ヒト<White>は今、生まれ変わろうと しているのかもしれない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000026>And in doing so, <Yellow>Mortals<White> may experience a kind of rebirth.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000028>だが、その道程は 決して平坦ではなかろう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000028>However, such a feat will surely present its own challenges.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000029>ゆえに、汝らが<Yellow>聖獣の力<White>を求めるのならば、 我らは<Yellow>ヒト<White>の可能性に、手を貸す事も いとわない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000029>In light of such, should <Yellow>Mortals<White> once again seek the <Yellow>Power of the Sacred Beasts<White>, we would not be loathe to further their potential.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4300002a><Yellow>ヒト<White>の答を聞かせて欲しい。
<voice:4300002d>……オレは……オレたち<Yellow>ヒト<White>は、 あんたたち聖獣から見れば、 愚かで小さな存在だ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4300002D>I...we, <Yellow>Mortals<White>, may seem foolish and fragile to you Sacred Beasts.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4300002e>あんたたちの助けがなければ、 とっくに滅んでいたかもしれない……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4300002E>It's true that if it weren't for your help, we probably would have been wiped out a long time ago already.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4300002f>だが、ユリスを倒したいと願ったあの時、 オレたちは<Yellow>ヒトの力<White>を感じた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4300002F>But when we were facing off against Yuris, praying with all our strength that we might win, we could feel the <Yellow>Power of Everyone's Hearts<White> coursing through us.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000030>それは、聖獣の力にも負けない、 強い心の光だった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000030>That power is something that even the Sacred Beasts can't rival. It's a beacon of light that connects our spirits!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000031>たとえ、つまづき、 迷う事があっても……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000031>And even if, eventually, we come across a challenge that causes us to stumble and fall...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000032><Yellow>ヒト<White>は……自分たちが選んだ道を、 自分たちの足で歩くべきだと…… オレは思う。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000032>I think that we, as <Yellow>People<White>, should be the ones to walk along the path that we chose with our own feet.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000033>だから…… オレたちに任せて欲しい……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000033>So Geyorkias... You can leave everything to us.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000034>……わかった。 では、我らは地上より去るとしよう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000034>...So it shall be. Then we Sacred Beasts shall be taking our leave of this land shortly.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000035>……忘れるな。汝らが道を誤れば、 再びユリスは現れ、<Yellow>ヒト<White>に…… 世界に災いをもたらすであろう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000035>But do not forget one thing. If the <Yellow>People<White> lose their way and bring Yuris to life once more... The destruction of this world will be all but certain.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000036>その時…… そこに我らの力はない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000036>If that should come to pass... You will not be able to depend on our power.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000038>地上から聖獣の力がなくなったら、 ボクはどうなるの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000038>If the world loses the Sacred Beasts and their powers, then what'll happen to me?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000039><Mao>……あなたは心を持った ひとつの命です。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000039><Mao>...you are an individual with a life and spirit of your own.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4300003a>地上に残るのも、 私たちと一緒に行くのも、 決めるのはあなた自身です。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4300003A>The decision to remain behind or leave this world with us is yours alone.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4300003b>……でも……ボク、 みんなと違うし…… 残ってもいいのかな……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4300003B>But I'm, you know, different from everyone else... Is it really okay for me to stay here?
<voice:4300003C>Of course, <Mao>. You're a <Yellow>Person<White> like anyone else.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4300003d>オレたちはみんな同じ…… 大地に生きる<Yellow>ヒト<White>だ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4300003D>We're all the same. We're just <Yellow>People<White> that share this land.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4300003f>心に種族などない。 ……そうだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4300003F>“The soul knows no color.” ...Isn't that right?
<voice:43000041>It appears you have made a decision, haven't you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000042><Mao>…… あなたは私たちの<Yellow>目<White>となり、 がんばってくれました。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000042><Mao>...thank you for being our <Yellow>eyes<White>. You did well.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000043>これからあなたは、 あなた自身のために生きるのです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000043>From now on, you should live to fulfill your own hopes and dreams.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000047>元気でね……お母さん…… さよなら……！
<voice:43000048><Veigue>、キミたちと旅した事、 ずっと忘れない！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:43000048><Veigue>, I'll never forget the time I spent traveling with you all.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:43000049>……オレも忘れない。 ありがとう、シャオルーン。
<voice:4300004a>うん、ぼくも！ ずっとキミたちの事、見てるからね！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4300004A>Yeah, same to you! I'll always be watching over you guys, okay?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4300004b>さよならみんな!! さよなら<Veigue>！
<voice:4300004c>ヒトよ…… 汝らの胸に灯りし希望の火が 世界を照らさん事を……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4300004C>Farewell, mortals... May the spark of hope that burns within your souls bring light to this world!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
